tag_list: edmond, wong, technology, buzz, buzzmob, mobile, apparel, clothing, social-networking, social-media
overview:
Edmond Wong is a Technology and Fashion entrepreneur. He currently serves as the COO of BuzzMob.

Most recently, Mr. Wong co-founded BuzzMob, a crowd engagement and fan technology app for live events. BuzzMob connects on-site attendees and delivers exclusive curated content to revolutionize the live event experience.

Prior to BuzzMob, Mr. Wong created, built and operated many iconic fashion, snowsports and action sports brands both in the US and worldwide.
